query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `exportHistory` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `exportType` enum('csv','pdf','excel','json') NOT NULL,
  `dataType` enum('candidates','interviews','feedback','analytics','campaigns','jobs','applications','other') NOT NULL,
  `fileName` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `fileUrl` text,
  `fileKey` text,
  `fileSize` bigint,
  `recordCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `filters` json,
  `columns` json,
  `status` enum('pending','processing','completed','failed','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `downloadCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `lastDownloadedAt` timestamp,
  `expiresAt` timestamp,
  `processingTime` int,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `ipAddress` varchar(50),
  `userAgent` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `exportType_idx` (`exportType`),
  INDEX `dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `expiresAt_idx` (`expiresAt`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `exportHistory` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,

  `errorMessage` text,

  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `exportType_idx` (`exportType`),
  INDEX `dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),

)
